The strength was that Professor Lambert was very knowledgeable and cared a lot about teaching the course.

very challenging class due to the range of topics covered. class was also dependent on student presentations which can vary in quality. but overall professor lamber did well in providing supplementary comments and materials to better understand concepts discussed.
